title: Two Letters From Columbus,OH Welcoming Ed Boyle to Team
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Two Letters From Columbus,OH Welcoming Ed Boyle to Team
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jay
Two letters from Lot 936 of latest Hunt Auction. These 1897 letters welcome Ed Boyle to the Columbus team. Interesting baseball content, especially for someone from the area. Both letters are in good shape and very readable. $250 for the pair delivered. If interested, please email me at oldjudge@gmail.com

Thanks---Jay
